page.description: Returns .t. if a text string contains only numbers
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = isnumber(C string [,L allow_decimal_separator [,L allow_thousands_separator ]])

argument.name: allow_decimal_separator
argument.description: Logical. Optional. Default = .F. .T. = allow decimal separators, .F. = do not allow decimal separators

argument.name: allow_thousands_separator
argument.description: Logical. Optional. Default = .F. .T. = allow thousands separators, .F. = do not allow thousands separators

page.discussion: ISNUMBER() returns .T. (TRUE) if a Character_String contains only numbers; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE).
